hostNotes.text:
Welcome. I am X and today we will work for around 30 minutes on xx

We’ll be doing xx ex. meditation followed by time for reflection and sharing with each other.

Let’s start with a mini check-in. How are you feeling right now? Please answer in two-three words. X, would you like to start?

> Let everyone in the session, including yourself, check in one by one.

Thank you all for checking in. Let’s get started.

content.text: Lean back and watch the sky in this mindfulness exercise. Practice being in the present moment can help us feel happier and more connected. To do this exercise, you can be outside or by a window.

hostNotes.text:
Find a comfortable position. I will start the audio exercise and we'll meet back here afterwards. 

> Push play to start the audio exercise

Now we’ll take 1 minute to reflect on our own.

xxMain question

xxFurther explanations of main question if needed

You can take notes on a piece of paper or just mental notes in your head. And there is no right or wrong here, our answers are our own. 1 minute starting now.

> Press play to start the timer.

That’s 1 minute and it’s time to move on.

content.heading: How did you experience to sky gaze?

hostNotes.text:
Now we are getting into the sharing part. We have three rules for sharing:

1. **What is said in here, stays in here.**
2. **All you need to do is listen.** There is no fixing, helping or advice-giving needed. We are just showing up and exploring what ourselves and others are going through.

3. **Everything on the inside is okay.** Anger, love, hatred, sadness. Whatever shows up. No wrongs, no rights. It is what it is.

There will be a timer set for 2 minutes as an indicator. If you don’t want to share you can always say ‘pass’.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone (or as many as you got time for) share one by one. Press play to start the timer. Re-start for each new sharing.

Thank you so much everyone.

Well done. If you’re up for it, you can continue what we started here today with a mission to bring this into your everyday life.

xx mission description

Before we leave this space let’s do a mini check-out. 

How are you feeling right now? Has anything shifted? Please answer in two-three words.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone in the session check out one by one.

Thank you all for checking out and for joining this session today.

> Finish session to send everyone off to the exit experience.

content.text: Welcome back, and well done. Practicing letting things come and go both on the inside and the outside can help us feel grounded and more satisfied with life.

en.name: PsyPal Sky gazing

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

en.description: A mindful exercise where you practice being with what is - in the sky right now. Note that you need to be outside or by a window to do this exercise.

content.text: Incline-se para trás e observe o céu neste exercício para praticar a atenção plena. Praticar estarmos conscientes do momento presente pode ajudar-nos a sentirmo-nos mais felizes. Para fazer este exercício, pode estar no exterior ou junto a uma janela.

hostNotes.text:
Find a comfortable position. I will start the audio exercise and we'll meet back here afterwards. 

> Push play to start the audio exercise

Now we’ll take 1 minute to reflect on our own.

xxMain question

xxFurther explanations of main question if needed

You can take notes on a piece of paper or just mental notes in your head. And there is no right or wrong here, our answers are our own. 1 minute starting now.

> Press play to start the timer.

That’s 1 minute and it’s time to move on.

content.heading: Como foi esta sua experiência de observação do céu?

hostNotes.text:
Now we are getting into the sharing part. We have three rules for sharing:

1. **What is said in here, stays in here.**
2. **All you need to do is listen.** There is no fixing, helping or advice-giving needed. We are just showing up and exploring what ourselves and others are going through.

3. **Everything on the inside is okay.** Anger, love, hatred, sadness. Whatever shows up. No wrongs, no rights. It is what it is.

There will be a timer set for 2 minutes as an indicator. If you don’t want to share you can always say ‘pass’.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone (or as many as you got time for) share one by one. Press play to start the timer. Re-start for each new sharing.

Thank you so much everyone.

content.heading: Como foi esta sua experiência de observação do céu?

hostNotes.text:
Well done. If you’re up for it, you can continue what we started here today with a mission to bring this into your everyday life.

xx mission description

Before we leave this space let’s do a mini check-out. 

How are you feeling right now? Has anything shifted? Please answer in two-three words.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone in the session check out one by one.

Thank you all for checking out and for joining this session today.

> Finish session to send everyone off to the exit experience.

content.text: Bem-vindo de volta e parabéns por ter completado este exercício. Ao praticar deixar as coisas fluir, deixando-as ir e voltar, pode ajudar-nos a sentirmos os pés assentes na terra e mais satisfeitos.

pt.name: Observar o ceu

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

pt.description: Um exercício de atenção plena que pode fazer sozinho ou em conjunto com outras pessoas.

content.text: Læn dig tilbage og se på himlen i denne mindfulness-øvelse. At øve sig i at være i nuet kan hjælpe os med at føle os gladere og mere forbundne. Du kan lave denne øvelse udenfor eller ved et vindue.

content.text:
Velkommen tilbage og godt klaret. 

At øve sig i at lade ting komme og gå både indvendigt og udvendigt kan hjælpe os med at føle os mere rodfæstede og mere tilfredse med livet.

da.name: Sky gazing

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

da.description: I dag starter vi med en mindfulness-øvelse, som du kan lytte til alene eller sammen med andre.

hostNotes.text:

content.text: Opřete se, uvolněte a pozorujte oblohu v tomto cvičení všímavosti. Prožívání přítomného okamžiku nám může pomoci cítit se šťastnější a více propojení. Toto cvičení se provádí venku nebo u okna s dobrým výhledem na oblohu.

hostNotes.text:
Find a comfortable position. I will start the audio exercise and we'll meet back here afterwards. 

> Push play to start the audio exercise

Now we’ll take 1 minute to reflect on our own.

xxMain question

xxFurther explanations of main question if needed

> Press play to start the timer.

That’s 1 minute and it’s time to move on.

content.heading: Jaký byl váš zážitek z pozorování oblohy?

hostNotes.text:

2. **All you need to do is listen.** There is no fixing, helping or advice-giving needed. We are just showing up and exploring what ourselves and others are going through.

content.text: Vítejte zpět. Výborně. Cvičení, jak nechat vnitřní i vnější záležitosti přicházet a odcházet, nám pomáhá cítit se ukotvení a v životě spokojenější.

cs.name: Pozorovani oblohy

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

cs.description:
Vítejte ve druhé fázi studie PsyPal. Každý druhý týden vám nabídneme online cvičení k procvičování dovedností jako je všímavost, zvládání obtížných pocitů nebo integrace vašich zkušeností z první fázi studie.

Dnes začneme cvičením všímavosti, které můžete poslouchat sami nebo společně s někým.

hostNotes.text:
Welcome. I am X and today we will work for around 30 minutes on xx

We’ll be doing xx ex. meditation followed by time for reflection and sharing with each other.

Let’s start with a mini check-in. How are you feeling right now? Please answer in two-three words. X, would you like to start?

> Let everyone in the session, including yourself, check in one by one.

Thank you all for checking in. Let’s get started.

content.text: Leun achterover en kijk naar de lucht in deze mindfulness-oefening. Oefenen met in het hier en nu zijn, kan ons helpen om gelukkiger te zijn en ons meer verbonden te voelen. Voor deze oefening kun je buiten zijn of bij een raam.

hostNotes.text:

xxMain question

3. **Everything on the inside is okay.** Anger, love, hatred, sadness. Whatever shows up. No wrongs, no rights. It is what it is.

> Let everyone in the session check out one by one.

> Finish session to send everyone off to the exit experience.

content.text:
Welkom terug en goed gedaan. 

Oefenen met het laten komen en gaan van dingen, zowel van binnen als van buiten, kan ons helpen om ons stabieler en meer tevreden te voelen.

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

nl.description: Leun achterover en kijk naar de lucht in deze mindfulness-oefening.
